lines.text: Listen! Ernie has schizoid-detritus-melanomus! When he gets depressed, he turns violent. So it's critical we keep him happy!
Look! They're tulips, a member of the lily family!
Hey! It's Bob, a member of the dufus family!
Matilda, tell me about these drapes...
Remember, I am only an "eye," not an "I."

[talking to stuffed bird]
Is the coast clear?
'That depend- if like danger'. Who are you? What is your name? 'Nose, Bloky Nose'.
Buns! Buns! I forgot my buns!
She's playing you Bob, I'm your only hope.
J.J., I'm about to be brilliant.
